metadata.Title: CVE-2021-35937 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A race condition vulnerability was found in rpm. A local unprivileged user could use this flaw to bypass the checks that were introduced in response to CVE-2017-7500 and CVE-2017-7501, potentially gaining root privileges. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> Only debugedit and librpmio9 binary packages are in main, and triaged with view to how they are used in the build process as described in https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/rpm/+bug/1913871

criterions.comment: rpm package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
